wikipedia_page.main: Frederick Beadon (6 December 1777 – 10 June 1879) was canon of Wells, Somerset, England. Beadon, third son of the Rev. Edward Beadon, rector of North Stoneham, was born in London on 6 December 1777.

response: *Frederick Beadon (1777–1879), English clergyman who lived to 101
He married Rachel, granddaughter of Bishop Gooch, of Ely, and had one son, Richard. He was also the uncle of Frederick Beadon.
